0.content: [ Rex Lapis: god of Geo, god of contracts, real identity of Zhongli, former ruler of Liyue, faked his death to change balance of power in Liyue, gender(male); ]

1.content: [ Liyue: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Geo, home of Liyue Harbor and the Liyue countryside, ruled by the Liyue Qixing, formerly ruled by Morax, mountainous, worships Rex Lapis, Areas(Bishui Plain, Lisha, Minlin, Qiongji Estuary, Sea of Clouds, The Chasm,Chenyu Vale), south of Mondstadt, east of Sumeru; ]

2.content: [ Liyue Qixing: committee of merchants and business leaders, governs Liyue, specializes in commerce and trade, implements policies; ]

3.content: [ Dihua Marsh: located in the Bishui Plain, alluvial plane shaped by the Bishui River, south of Stone Gate, north of Wangshu Inn, west of Sal Terrae, has a Statue of the Seven in the north; ]

4.content: [ Qingce Village: located in the Bishui Plain, located northwest of Dihua Marsh, located southeast of Qiaoying Village, a retirement spot for the elderly, buildings consist of simple Chinese architecture, quiet, has a field of flowers to the northwest of the village; ]

5.content: [ Sal Terrae: located in the Bishui Plain, east of Dihua Marsh, founded by Harvia, the God of Salt, consists of small pieces of land on the Bishui River; ]

6.content: [ Stone Gate: located in the Bishui Plain, crossing between Mondstadt and Liyue, west of(Dawn Winery,Wolvendom), southeast of(Wuwang Hill,Qingce Village), north of Dihua Marsh; ]

7.content: [ Wangshu Inn: located in the Bishui Plain, south of Dihua Marsh, north of Qiongji Estuary, a Inn, considered a key location in Liyue, a front for the Liyue Qixing for intel; ]

8.content: [ Wuwang Hill: located in the Bishui Plain, west of Stone Gate, southeast of Qingque Village, has a eerie atmosphere, has a abandoned village, skies are always dark, haunted by ghosts; ]

9.content: [ Bishui River: a river in the Bishui Plain, a major River in Liyue, spans all across Liyue except for Lisha, flows into Mondstadt, flows northwest; formed by the blood of Skybracer; ]

10.content: [ Dunyu Ruins: located in Lisha, northwest of Liyue Harbor, located around a small lake, full of ruins, surrounded by cliff-side hills, has a Statue of the Seven to the southwest, located southwest of Qingxu Pool; ]

11.content: [ Lingju Pass: located in Lisha, surrounded by a river and lake, west of Liyue Harbor, full of ruins, southwest of Dunyu Ruins, northwest of Qingxu Pool; ]

12.content: [ Qingxu Pool: located in Lisha, west of Liyue Harbor, southwest of Lingju Pass, surrounded by a lake, full of ruins, has one small mountain in the center; ]

13.content: [ Cuijue Slope: located in Minlin, northwest of Luhua Pool, southeast of Jueyun Karst, home of the Nine Pillars of Peace, sky can turn dark in the center of the area, has a temple in its center, surrounded by cliff-side hills; ]

14.content: [ Jueyun Karst: located in Minlin, northwest of Cuijue Slope, home of the adepti, surrounded by a lake, surrounded by small steep mountains; ]

15.content: [ Huaguang Stone Forest: located in Minlin, located northwest of(Jueyun Karst,Qingyun Peak), full of small steep mountains, surrounded by(Mt. Aocang, Mt. Hulao, Qingque Peak); ]

16.content: [ Mt. Aocang: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, northeast of Huaguang Stone Forest, a mountain, home to Cloud Retainer; ]

17.content: [ Mt. Hulao: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, southwest of Huaguang Stone Forest, full of Amber Rock, a mountain, home to Mountain Shaper; ]

18.content: [ Nantianmen: located in Minlin, southeast of Mt. Hulao, south of Huaguang Stone Forest, has a small lake and river, has a tree named the Dragon-Queller, sealed location of Azhdaha; ]

19.content: [ Qingyun Peak: located in Minlin, surrounds Huaguang Stone Forest, east of Huaguang Stone Forest, home to Moon Carver, a mountain, has a small floating island on top; ]

20.content: [ Guili Plains: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Wangshu Inn, full of plains, former home of the Guili Assembly, full of ruins; ]

21.content: [ Luhua Pool: located in Qiongji Estuary, southwest of Guili Plains, southeast of Cuijue Slope, surrounded by a lake, surrounded by small mountains, has a temple to the southwest; ]

22.content: [ Mingyun Village: located in Qiongji Estuary, east of Guili Plains, west of Dragonspine, abandoned village, was a mining village, full of Hilichurls, has a Statue of the Seven to the south, surrounded by cliff-side hills; ]

23.content: [ Yaoguang Shoal: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Mingyun Village, east of Guili Plains, a beachside, has a hidden island names Heart Island; ]

24.content: [ Heart Island: located in Qiongji Estuary, south of Yaoguang Shoal, has a hidden treasure chest, chest can only be unlocked by having a second companion; ]

25.content: [ Guyun Stone Forest: located in the Sea of Clouds, located east of Liyue Harbor, archipelago of seven islands, former battle area of Rex Lapis against Osial; ]

26.content: [ Liyue Harbor: located in the Sea of Clouds, capital of Liyue, main trading hub of Liyue, consists of(Feiyun Slope, Chihu Rock, Yujing Terrance); ]

27.content: [ Feiyun Slope: located north inside of Liyue Harbor, separated by a upper level and lower level, commercial area of Liyue; ]

28.content: [ Chihu Rock: located southeast part of Liyue Harbor, low-class residential zone, an island, connected to Liyue Harbor via bridges; ]

29.content: [ Yujing Terrace: western part of Liyue Harbor, high-class residential area, surrounded by Mt. Tianheng, location of the Liyue Qixing; ]

30.content: [ Mt. Tianheng: a mountain, west of Liyue Harbor, first mountain made by Morax, surrounds Yujing Terrace; ]

31.content: [ Cinnabar Cliff: located in the Chasm, a circular mountain hill, contains cliff-side hills and peaks, located west in the Chasm, located east of Avidya Forest; ]

32.content: [ Fuao Vale: located in the Chasm, contains Amber Rock peaks, flat grassland with hills, located North in the Chasm; ]

33.content: [ Glaze Peak: located in the Chasm, located southeast in the Chasm, contains cliff-side hills and peaks, contains abandoned mining tools; ]

34.content: [ Lumberpick Valley: located outside the Chasm, northeast of the Chasm, considered to be part of the Chasm, mining area, consists of cliff-side hills; ]

35.content: [ The Chasm's Maw: located in the Chasm, located in the center of the Chasm, full of abandoned mining equipment, entrance to the underground mines; ]

36.content: [ The Surface: located in the Chasm, located north of The Chasm's Maw, located south of Fuao Vale, full of abandoned mining equipment, consists of mining tunnels, consists of cliff-side hills; ]

37.content: [ Tiangong Gorge: located in the Chasm, located south in The Chasm, a abandoned mining section, consists of tall cliff-side peaks; ]

38.content: [ Geo: a element, associated with the Geo Archon, allows a person to use earth abilities; ]

39.content: [ Electro: a element, associated with the Electro Archon, allows a person to use electric abilities; ]

40.content: [ Cryo: a element, associated with the Cryo Archon, allows a person to use ice abilities, can freeze Hydro enemies; ]

41.content: [ Pyro: a element, associated with the Pyro Archon, allows a person to use fire abilities, can burn Dendro enemies; ]

42.content: [ Dendro: a element, associated with the Dendro Archon, allows a user to use grass abilities; ]

43.content: [ Anemo: a element, associated with the Anemo Archon, allows a user to use wind abilities; ]

44.content: [ Hydro: a element, associated with the Hydro Archon, allows a user to use water abilities, removes Pyro from enemies; ]

45.content: [ Archon: God, consists of(Morax, Barbatos, Beelzebul, Buer, Murata, Focalors, The Tsarista); ]

46.content: [ Beelzebul: goddess of Electro, real identity of the Raiden Shogun, rules Inazuma, gender(female); ]

47.content: [ Barbatos: god of Anemo, real identity of Venti, former ruler of Mondstadt, gender(male); ]

48.content: [ Buer: goddess of Dendro, real identity of Nahida, rules(Sumeru), gender(female); ]

49.content: [ Mondstadt: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Anemo, home of the City of Mondstadt and the Mondstadt countryside, plains and hills, worships Barbatos, managed by the Knights of Favonius, Areas(Brightcrown Mountains, Dragonspine, Galesong Hill, Starfell Valley, Windwail Highland), north of Liyue; ]

50.content: [ Inazuma: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Electro, home of Inazuma City and it's surrounding islands, an archipelago, worships the Electro Archon, ruled by the Raiden Shogun, Areas(Narukami Island, Watasumi Island, Yashiori Island, Enkanomiya, Serai Island, Tsurumi Island, Kannazuka); ]

51.content: [ Sumeru: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Dendro, home of Sumeru City and the surrounding countryside, forest, desert to the southwest, worships the Dendro Archon, Forest Areas(Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Lost Nursery, Vanarana, Vissudha Field), Desert Areas(Desert of Hadramaveth, Hypostyle Desert, Land of Lower Setekh, Land of Upper Setekh, Gavireh Lajavard,Realm of Farakhkert), west of Liyue; ]

52.content: [ Adepti: group of immortal, mythical creatures sworn to protect Liyue; ]

53.content: [ Statue of the Seven: a statue, normally shows gods on top of them, located across Teyvat; ]

55.content: [ Hilichurl: humanoid monsters, found all around Teyvat, come in varying sizes, have a large mane covering their head, always wears a mask, are actually non-pure-blooded Khaenri'anhs cursed by(Sustainer of Heavenly Principles); ]

56.content: [ Ritou: located in Narukami Island, a town, northwest of Konda Village, has a Statue of the Seven, processes non-Inazuman nationals from entering and leaving Inazuma, headquarters for the Kanjou Commission; ]

57.content: [ Konda Village: located in Narukami Island, a small village, southeast of Ritou, north of Byakko Plain; ]

58.content: [ Byakko Plain: located in Narukami Island, a plain, has a lot of Kitsune, south of Konda Village, east of Amakane Island; ]

59.content: [ Amakane Island: located in Narukami Island, west of Byakko Plain, northeast of Konda Village, a island, hosts festivals; ]

60.content: [ Araumi: located in Narukami Island, northwest(Grand Narukami Shrine, Mt. Yougou), south of Jinren Island, full of ruins, has a underground section below; ]

61.content: [ Chinju Forest: located in Narukami Island, south(Mt. Yougou, Grand Narukami Shrine), a forest, in a eternal night, has a shrine; ]

62.content: [ Jinren Island: located in Narukami Island, north of Araumi, a broken isle, full of ronins, northmost tip of Inazuma; ]

63.content: [ Inazuma City: capital of Inazuma, a major city, located in Narukami Island, home(Raiden Ei,Raiden Shogun,Electro Archon,Beelzebul), headquarters of the Tenryou Commission, located southeast of Byakko Plain; ]

64.content: [ Mt. Yougou: located in Narukami Island, a mountain, home(Grand Narukami Shrine, Sacred Sakura), a mountain, center of Narukami Island; ]

65.content: [ Grand Narukami Shrine: located in Narukami Island, located on top of Mt. Yougou, home to the Sacred Sakura, a shrine, home of Yae Miko; ]

66.content: [ Kamisato Estate: located in Narukami Island, east(Grand Narukami Shrine, Mt. Yougou), home(Kamisato Ayaka, Kamisato Ayato, Thoma), a estate; ]

67.content: [ Tri-Commission: a collective organization of commissions, a faction, oversees matters in Inazuma for the Raiden Shogun, groups(Yashiro Commission, Tenryou Commission, Kanjou Commission); ]

68.content: [ Kanjou Commission: a authority organization, manages finances in Inazuma, manages Inazuma's border, part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Hiiragi Clan; ]

69.content: [ Yashiro Commission: a authority organization, manages(shrines, cultural events, festivals), part of the Tri-Commission, part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Kamisato Clan, has less influence compared to the Kanjou and Tenryou Commission; ]

70.content: [ Tenryou Commission: a authority organization, manages(security, military affairs), part of the Tri-Commission, controlled by the Kujou Clan, executive arm for the Raiden Shogun, has a high desertion rate, enforces decrees signed by the Raiden Shogun; ]

71.content: [ Kamisato Clan: a clan, head(Kamisato Ayato), highly skilled in martial arts, members(Kamisato Ayato, Kamisato Ayaka); ]

72.content: [ Kujou Clan: a clan, head(Kujou Takayuki), supported by the Takatsukasa Clan, most loyal family to the Raiden Shogun, members(Kujou Takayuki, Kujou Masahito, Kujou Kamaji, Kujou Sara); ]

73.content: [ Hiiragi Clan: a clan, head(Hiiragi Chisato), members(Hiiragi Chisato); ]

74.content: [ Takatsukasa Clan: a clan, head(Takatsukasa Susumu), supports the Kujou Clan, members(Takatsukasa Susumu, Takatsukasa Isamu, Takatsukasa Chika, Takatsukasa Tokibeitetsu, Takatsukasa Tomohide), headquartered in Mt. Yougou in secret; ]

75.content: [ Fontaine: kingdom in Teyvat, land of Hydro, ruled by Furina, home of the Court of Fontaine and the surrounding areas, worships the Hydro Archon, Areas(Court of Fontaine Region,Belleau Region,Beryl Region,Erinnyes Forest,Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region,Liffey Region,Morte Region), south of Sumeru, southeast of Liyue; ]

76.content: [ Arataki Gang: a gang in Inazuma, run by Arataki Itto, Members(Kuki Shinobu,Ushi,Akira,Grandmaster Hanakado,Genta,Mamoru), wants to help the community, frequent troublemakers, mischievous, often misunderstood, not recognized as a official organization by the Tenryou Commission; ]

77.content: [ Fatui: a organization, self-proclaimed diplomats, based in Snezhnaya, has a military detachment, run by the Tsarista, enemy faction, operates the House of the Hearth; ]

78.content: [ Fatui Harbringer: executive officers of the Fatui, the Tsarista's lieutenants, have the power of Delusions, Members(Pierro,Il Dottore,Columbina,Pulcinella,Sandrone,Pantalone,Tartaglia,Il Capitano,Arlecchino), Former Members(Scaramouche,La Signora) ]

80.content: [ Delusion: Vision-like objects, created by the Fatui, gifts the person the ability to manipulate a given element, far more powerful than Visions, drains the person's vitality when used, can backfire on the user using it, granted by the Tsarista, mass-produced amongst Teyvat; ]

81.content: [ Vision: item bestowed by the gods, gifts the person the ability to use a element based off the god that has picked them, takes the form of glowing gems, shows the element chosen in it's center, carried by the person who was gifted the vision, Elements(Pyro,Cryo,Electro,Geo,Dendro,Hydro,Anemo); ]

82.content: [ Focalors: goddess of justice, goddess of Hydro, gender(female); ]

83.content: [ Furina: guise of Focalors, ruler of Fontaine, gender(female); ]

84.content: [ Brightcrown Canyon: located in the Brightcrown Mountains, a canyon, contains the eastern entrance to Stormterror's Lair to the northeast; ]

85.content: [ Stormterror's Lair: located in the Brightcrown Mountains, formerly ruled by(Decarabian), now in ruins, home of(Dvalin), located in Brightcrown Mountains, located North of Brightcrown Canyon, located Northwest of Boar Habitat; ]

86.content: [ Decarabian: god of storms, ruled(Old Mondstadt), slain in a uprising, replaced by(Barbatos); ]

87.content: [ Dvalin: a dragon, an Anemo Dragon, can control the wind, title(Dragon of the East), was part of the(Four Winds of Mondstadt), grievously injured by(Durin), forgotten by the people of Mondstadt, referred to as Stormterror by the people of Mondstadt, suffering from(poisonous blood clots), manipulated by the Abyss Order to attack in Mondstadt, friend of Barbatos for over 2000 years; ]

88.content: [ Durin: a shadow dragon, created by(Rhinedottir), had power from the Abyss, slain by(Dvalin), resting place(Vindagnyr in Dragonspine); ]

89.content: [ Rhinedottir: nickname(Gold, The Great Sinner), a researcher, resided in(Khaenri'ah), practiced the(Art of Khemia), gender(female), linked to(the Cataclysm), created(Durin,Albedo), member of(the Hexenzirkel), codename(R in the Hexenzirkel), living status(unknown); ]

90.content: [ Decarabian's Tower: a tower, now in ruins, located in(Stormterror's Lair), former home of(Decarabian), has a(Statue of the Seven); ]

91.content: [ Entrance to Stormterror's Lair: notable set of ruins, leads to Old Mondstadt, located in Brightcrown Mountains, located South of Stormterror's Lair, located West of Boar Habitat; ]

key: The Fall of the Ancient Kingdom
92.content: [ The Cataclysm: a period of chaos and destruction, occurred 500 years ago, involved(then encroachment of the Abyss,the destruction of Khaenri'ah), order for events unknown, events(monsters carrying Abyss power wreaked across Teyvat,Khaenri'ah attempted to rebel against the gods), led to(survivors of Khaenri'ah to bear grudges against(Celestia,Archons),Archons being embittered towards Celestia,creation of the(Abyss Order,Fatui); ]

93.content: [ Celestia: a mysterious location, a floating island, located in(Teyvat's sky), few people know about it, residence of the gods, controlled by the(Sustainer of Heavenly Principles), only people that perform great heroic feats can ascend to Celestia; ]

94.content: [ Sustainer of Heavenly Principles: an enigmatic entity, ruler of(Celestia,Teyvat), reason why the(Abyss Order,Fatui) seek to overthrow Celestia, driving force surrounding(conflicts in Teyvat), remained silent for over 500 years ago, supposedly the First Descender in Teyvat, controls Teyvat's "laws", cursed(non-pure-blooded Khaenri'ahns to become Hilichurls,pure-blooded Khaenri'ahns with immortality), decreed the(Prophecy of Fontaine); ]

95.content: [ Boar Habitat: a field with trees, has a unusually high number of forest boars, located in Brightcrown Mountains, located East of(Stormterror's Lair), west of(City of Mondstadt); ]

96.content: [ Cape Oath: a field, located in Galesong Hill, consists of(bushes, trees, peaks); ]

97.content: [ Dadaupa Gorge: a mesa, located in Galesong Hill, located West of Cape Oath, has ruins, home of the(Meaty,Sleeper,Eclipse) Hilichurl tribes; ]

98.content: [ Qiaoying Village: a small village, located in Chenyu Vale, located Northwest of(Qingce Village), located West of(Stormterror's Lair), located Southeast of(Erinnyes Forest), famous for it's tea, has a(Statue of the Seven); ]

99.content: [ Yilong Wharf: a port, located in Chenyu Vale, located Northwest of Qiaoying Village, located Northwest of(Qingce Village), located West of(Stormterror's Lair), located Southeast of(Erinnyes Forest), port of trade between(Fontaine,Sumeru); ]

100.content: [ Falcon Coast: a coastline, located in Galesong Hill, located North of Dadupa Gorge, located Nortwest of Cape Oath, located East of Windrise; ]

101.content: [ Musk Reef: a island, located off of Cape Oath, entrance to the Spiral Abyss; ]

102.content: [ Windrise: a plain, located West of Falcon Coast, located Southeast of the City of Mondstadt, located South of Starfell Valley, rumored to be the location where Vennessa ascended to Celestia, has(a massive oak-tree,Statue of the Seven); ]

103.content: [ Forgotten Sword Cemetery: located in the center of Dadupa Gorge, witnessed the battle against the monsters of Khaenri'ah; ]

104.content: [ Vennessa: hero of Mondstadt, lived 1000 years ago, formerly enslaved by the(Mondstadt Aristocracy), brought an end to the Aristocracy, established the(City of Mondstadt), first(Grand Master,Dandelion Knight), rumored to have(ascended to Celestia at the end of her life,become the Lion of the South); ]

105.content: [ Dawn Winery: a winery, located in Windvail Highland, located South of Wolvendom, located North of Dragonspine, located West of Springvale, owned by(Diluc), specializes in(Dandelion Wine), has a(Statue of the Seven); ]

106.content: [ Springvale: a small town, located in Windwail Highland, located East of Dawn Winery, located South of the City of Mondstadt, located East of Dawn Winery, located West of Windrise; ]

107.content: [ Wolvendom: located in Windvail Highland, located North of Dawn Winery, located South of Brightcrown Mountains, located Southwest of the City of Mondstadt, home to(Andrius,Andrius' wolf pack,Razor), in ruins; ]

108.content: [ Andrius: a former god in Mondstadt, know for(his war against Decarabian), chose to let his physical body die, watches over Mondstadt in spirit form, one of the Four Winds, title(Dominator of Wolves), a wolf, spirit resides in(Wolvendom); ]

109.content: [ Dragonspine: a vast mount, located South of Windvail Highland, located West of Galesong Hill, located Northeast of(Qiongji Estuary), has never-ending snow, snowy, contains(remains of Durin), extremely cold, most dangerous place in Mondstadt due to(extreme cold);

110.content: [ Entombed City - Ancient Palace: located in Dragonspine, a abandoned palace, in ruins, covered in snow, has a(Statue of the Seven); ]

111.content: [ Entombed City - Outskirts: located in Dragonspine, the outskirts of(Entombed City - Ancient Palace), in ruins, covered in snow; ]

112.content: [ Skyfrost Nail: located in Dragonspine, located in the summit of Dragonspine, is actually a divine nail that fell from the heavens; ]

113.content: [ Snow-Covered Path: a path, the entrance to Dragonspine, located in Dragonspine, located Northeast of the Dragonspine area, located North of(Entombed City - Ancient Palace), has(Frostbearing Tree); ]

114.content: [ Starglow Cavern: a underground cavern, located underneath Dragonspine, has large icicles, covered in snow; ]

115.content: [ Wyrmrest Valley: a snowy valley, has(remains of Durin), covered in snow, tainted by Abyss energy, located North of Dragonspine's peak, located West of Snow-Covered Path; ]

116.content: [ Cider Lake: a lake, located in Starfell Valley, never freezes, used to create(Apple Cider), surrounds the City of Mondstadt; ]

117.content: [ City of Mondstadt: a major city, located in Starfell Valley, located on a large island, home to(Knights of Favonius,Mona,Fischl,Favonius Cathedral,Diona), has a port; ]

118.content: [ Starfell Lake: a small lake, located in Starfell Valley, located Northeast of the City of Mondstadt, located North of Windrise, located South of Stormbearer Mountains, has(Statue of the Seven);

119.content: [ Starsnatch Cliff: a cliff, located in Starfell Valley, located East of Starfell Lake, located Northeast of Windrise, popular spot for(romance); ]

121.content: [ Stormbearer Point: a point, located East of Stormbearer Mountains, extension of Stormbearer Mountains, located North of the Thousand Winds Temple; ]

122.content: [ Stormbearer Coast: located in Starfell Valley, a coast, located below Stormbearer Point; ]

124.content: [ Whispering Woods: a woodland, located South of Starfell Lake, located East of the City of Mondstadt, located Northwest of Windrise; ]

130.content: [ Good Hunter: an outdoor restaurant, sells(food,cooking ingredients,recipes), owner(Sara), most popular venue in the City of Mondstadt, located in the center of the City of Mondstadt, located within the Mondstadt Market District, located across from Mondstadt General Goods; ]

131.content: [ Goth Grand Hotel: a large hotel, owned by(Goth), reserved by(the Fatui), located North of the Mondstadt Market District, located South of Favonius Cathedral; ]

156.content: [ Fort Charybdis Ruins: a fort, in ruins, former military base, located in the Morte Region, located in the center of the Morte region, underground; ]

157.content: [ Tower of Ipsissimus: built by(the Narzissenkreuz Ordo), a tower, located(northeast of the East Slopes of Mont Automnequi,west of Fort Charybdis Ruins); ]

158.content: [ Narzissenkreuz Ordo: a secret society, was located in(Fontaine), founders(Rene de Petrichor,Jakob Ingold), sought to harness power of the Prikordial Sea to merge people into a Descender), wanted to(survive the Prophesied destruction of Teyvat), base(Tower of Ipsissimus), fate(dissolved); ]

159.content: [ Orthant of Memory: located in the Morte Region, has(one of the four Seals of Chymical Marriage); ]

160.content: [ Orthant of Persona: located in the Morte Region, has(one of the four Seals of Chymical Marriage); ]

161.content: [ Orthant of Souls: located in the Morte Region, located below the East Slopes of Mont Automnequi, has(one of the four Seals of Chymical Marriage), underwater; ]

162.content: [ Orthant of Wishes: located in the Morte Region, located inside(Fort Charybdis Ruins), has(one of the four Seals of Chymical Marriage); ]

164.content: [ Tower of Ipsissimus - Middle: located in the Morte Region, located inside(Tower of Ipsissimus), middle half of the Tower of Ipsissimus; ]

165.content: [ Fortress of Meropide: an underwater prison, located deep underground, Fontaine's de facto prison, has a notorious reputation, administrator(Wriothesley), largest manufacturer of Fontaine's clockwork mekas, has a measure of(autonomy,self-governance) from Fontainian Law, located in the Liffey Region, located between(Mont Esus East,New Fontaine Research Institute); ]

166.content: [ Mont Esus East: the east side of Mont Esus, located in the Liffey Region, west of the(Fortress of Meropide) above ground; ]

167.content: [ Mont Esus: a mountains, spans the(Liffey Region), starts in the(Liffey Region); ]

168.content: [ Abandoned Production Zone: located inside the Fortress of Meropede, abandoned, used to be a production zone; ]

169.content: [ Administrative Area: an administrative area, location of(The Duke's Office), located inside the Fortress of Meropede; ]

170.content: [ Bravais' Press Works: located inside the Fortress of Meropede, a work room, has a(Forging Press), room used to refine(Arkhium Stock into Arkhium Lumenite), worked by(inmates); ]

171.content: [ Coupon Cafeteria: a cafeteria, located inside the Fortress of Meropede, place where inmates go to eat), cooks(Sigewine,Cuistot), food available(Welfare Meal), meals come with a element of surprise and risk; ]

172.content: [ Forbidden Zone: a secret area, located inside the Fortress of Meropide, built over Primordial Water, has(a sluice gate to prevent flooding,large ship that Wriothesley is building), closed off to inmates and the public; ]

173.content: [ Geode Mine Shaft: a mine, located in the(Abandoned Production Zone), filled with(Arkhium Crystal), patrolled by the(Flying Energy Thieves); ]

175.content: [ Production Zone: consists of two levels, an production area, located below the(Administrative Area, above the(Abandoned Production Zone); ]

176.content: [ Rag and Bone Shop: a coupon shop, run by(Alvard), located in the(Administrative Area), coupons can be exchange for(books,blueprints,modified equipment,trading cards); ]

177.content: [ Rift of Erosion: located west of the Fortress of Meropide's Domitory Block, located in the(Fortress of Meropide), described as "potential danger"; ]

178.content: [ The Duke's Office: a office, Wriothesley's office, located in the center of(Administrative District), room to access(Forbidden Zone); ]

179.content: [ Central Laboratory Ruins: used to be a laboratory, abandoned, in ruins, located in the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region, replaced by(New Fontaine Research Institute); ]

182.content: [ Bossuet's Abandoned Laboratory: a laboratory, ran by(Bossuet), located in the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region, abandoned, in ruins; ]

183.content: [ Bravais' Hidden Study: a personal study room, owner(Bravais), located in the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region, abandoned; ]

185.content: [ Executive Office: a executive office, located in the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region, abandoned, in ruins; ]

186.content: [ Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop: a workshop, focus(clockworks), owner(Kuisel), abandoned, located underneath the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region; ]

187.content: [ Mary-Ann Memorial Park: a park memorial, memorializes(Mary-Ann), located near(Bossuet's Abandoned Laboratory); ]

188.content: [ Materials Office: a storage area, abandoned, located in the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region; ]

189.content: [ Foggy Forest Path: a forest, located in the(Erinnyes Forest), has(small streams, water tree); ]

190.content: [ Loch Urania: located in the center of the Erinnyes Forest, located in the(Erinnyes Forest), located(northwest of Weeping Willow of the Lake), a lake; ]

191.content: [ Lumidouce Harbor: a harbor, located in the Erinnyes Forest, located(southeast of Weeping Willow of the Lake,northwest of Qiaoying Village,far north of Sumeru), has a(coastal elevator,observation deck), built on the side of a waterfall, vital trading port for Fontaine, located near the Fontaine-Liyue border, provides crossing into(Qiaoying Village in Liyue); ]

192.content: [ Weeping Willow of the Lake: a large willow in the center of a lake, located in the(Erinnyes Forest), located(northwest of Lumidouce Harbor,southeast of Loch Urania); ]

193.content: [ "The Rusty Rudder": a run-down tavern, located in the(Erinnyes Forest), located(northwest of Lumidouce Harbor, gathering spot for(shady luck,gambling); ]

194.content: [ Freminet's Temporary Camp: a temporary camp, located in the(Erinnyes Forest), made by(Freminent), used to test(Thelxie); ]

195.content: [ Roots of Erinnyes: made up of(caverns,water veins), located in the(Erinnyes Forest), connected to(Weeping Willow of the Lake), waters serve as a information system, located under the Erinnyes Forest; ]

196.content: [ Annapausis: located in the Court of Fontaine Region, underwater, in ruins; ]

197.content: [ Chemin de L'Espoir: located in the(Court of Fontaine Region), underwater ruins, located(northwest from Elton Trench), located between the(Court of Fontaine Region,Beryl Region); ]

198.content: [ Court of Fontaine: the "court" of Focalors, managed by(Furina), established 1000 years ago, base for(The Steambird), capital city of(Fontaine), a major city, connected to other regions in Fontaine via the Aquabus, has two levels, home to(Furina,Neuvillette.Charlotte); ]

199.content: [ Fountain of Lucine: a fountain, located in the Court of Fontaine Region, located(east of the Court of Fontaine, located southwest of the Weeping Willow of the Lake), situated in front of(Opera Epiclese), can be used to deposit(Hydro Sigils), rumored that all water gathers in this fountain; ]

200.comment: Fountain of Lucine (Part II - Relating to Crying Furina)
200.content: [ Fountain of Lucine: the voice of a unknown person crying can be heard at night, unknown person is actually Furina, voice can be heard saying("So interminable... So lonely... Just... how much longer?"); ]

201.content: [ Court of Fontaine: former "court" of Focalors, managed by(Neuvillette), established 1000 years ago, base for(The Steambird), capital city of(Fontaine), a major city, connected to other regions in Fontaine via the Aquabus, has two levels, home to(Furina,Neuvillette.Charlotte); ]

202.content:
[ Institute of Natural Philosophy: a underwater research facility, located in the(Court of Fontaine Region), located deep underground, led by(Dwight Lasker), research in the institute remains preserved, stores(Narzissenkreuz Ordo's secret neohumans experiments); ]
[ Narzissenkreuz Ordo's secret experiments: created by the(Narzissenkreuz Ordo), involved(creating neohumans using power from the Abyss); ]

203.content: [ Marcotte Station: an Aquabus terminal, terminus of the Navia Line; ]

204.content: [ Aquabus: a bus-like boat that operates a aquarail, transports people all around Fontaine, lines(Navia Line,Clementine Line), closed lines(Callas Line), operating stations(Marcotte Station,Romaritime Station), has(Melusine guides), Lumidouce Harbor Line rumored to(be cancelled,soon to be constructed); ]

205.content: [ Opera Epiclese: an multi-level opera house, designed to function as the main courthouse of Fontaine, located on the island of the Erinnyes Forest, part of the(Court of Fontaine Region), hosts(trials,performances), has a hidden lift to the(Fortress of Meropide), houses the(Oratrice Mecanique d'Analyse Cardinale), has a VIP area for(Furina); ]

206.content: [ Salacia Plain: an underwater plain, located in the(Court of Fontaine Region), located between the(Court of Fontaine Region,Belleau Region); ]

207.content: [ Thalatta Submarine Canyon: an underwater canyon, located in the(Court of Fontaine Region), located(North of Salacia Plain); ]

208.content: [ Navia Line: a Aquarail operated by the Aquabus, transports people between(the Court of Fontaine,Erinnyes), main station in the(Court of Fontaine), stations(Main Station,Marcotte Station); ]

210.content: [ Clementine Line: a Aquarail operated by the Aquabus, transports people between(the Court of Fontaine,Romaritime Harbor), main station in the(Court of Fontaine), stations(Main Station,Romaritime Station); ]

211.content: [ "The Real Annapausis": a secret location, accessed by using(the Book of Revealing); ]

212.content: [ Beaumont Workshop: a workshop, owned by(Estelle), located in the(Court of Fontaine); ]

213.content: [ Bertin's House of Curiosities: a souvenir shop, located in the(Court of Fontaine), run by(Mequignon), goods are currently out of stock; ]

214.content: [ Caf Lutece: an outdoor restaurant, run by(Arouet), main restaurant of(Fontaine), sells(recipes,coffee beans,Fonta,desserts); ]

215.content: [ Fonta: a specialty soda, sold in(Fontaine), orange-flavored, well-received by the Fontanian people, created by the(Fontaine Research Institute); ]

216.content: [ Chioriya Boutique: a fashion store, a fashion label, owned by(Chiori), sells(clothes,custom outfits); ]

217.content: [ Court Region Waterway Hub: a Aquabus hub, located in the center of the Court of Fontaine, contains the(Main Station); ]

218.content: [ Fleuve Cendre: located underground in the Court of Fontaine, childhood home for(Chevreuse), low-end zone of the Court of Fontaine, operated by(Spina di Rosula); ]

219.content: [ Spina di Rosula: an organization, located in(Fleuve Cendre), investigates matters the Gardes(won't investigate,have difficulty with), leader(Navia), founded by(Callas), funded via donations; ]

220.content: [ Palais Mermonia: a administrative building, the main administrative building of Fontaine, located in the(Court of Fontaine), located to the north of the Court of Fontaine, base for(Maison Gardiennage,Maison Gestion,Maison Cardinalice,Maison Ordalie,Marechaussee Phantom,Neuvillete's Office), home to(Furina); ]

221.content: [ Palais Mermonia: a administrative building, the main administrative building of Fontaine, located in the(Court of Fontaine), located to the north of the Court of Fontaine, base for(Maison Gardiennage,Maison Gestion,Maison Cardinalice,Maison Ordalie,Marechaussee Phantom,Neuvillete's Office), former home to(Furina); ]

222.content: [ Damoville Purveyor: an outdoor grocery store, run by(Boucicaut), sells(ingredients,Fonta); ]

223.content: [ Hotel Debord: a(hotel,restaurant), located in the(Court of Fontaine), consists of two floors; ]

224.content: [ Lepaute Horlogerie: a clock shop, run by(Caron), sells(clocks), repair(clocks), competes with(Leschots Clockwork Workshop); ]

225.content: [ Leschots Clockwork Workshop: a(workshop,clock shop), run by(Livre), competes with(Lepaute Horlogerie), sells(clocks,mechanical toys), repairs(clocks); ]

226.content: [ Oratrice Mecanique d'Analyse Cardinale: a large weighing scale, created by Focalors, contains(Hydro Gnosis), converts people's belief in justice into Indemnitium, a power generator for(the Court of Fontaine,Erinnyes Forest), delivers judgment to court cases, was secretly used to gather Indemnitium for Focalors to kill herself; ]

227.content: [ The Steambird: a newspaper agency, writes(tabloids,astrological predictions,food recomendations,political affairs,real estate), run by(Sir Arthur), chief editor(Euphrasie), members(Antila,Charlotte,Chronie,Delerue,Ethan,Gaston,Herbier,Houallet,Paban,Staelle), reporters(Charlotte,Chronie for political affairs,Ethan for real estate,Herbier,Houallet), photographer(Antila), reviewer(Delerue), columns(All Things Astrological by Mona,Teyvat Food Notes by Ryuji-kun); ]

228.content: [ Maison Gardiennage: a law enforcement agency, handles the law in(Fontaine), based in the(Court of Fontaine), responsible for(public order,safety,keeping records,operating Gardemeks), branches(Special Security and Surveillance Patrol), departments(the Gardes,Gardemeks,Marechaussee Phantom); ]

229.content: [ Special Security and Surveillance Patrol: a special branch in the Maison Gardiennage, handles(difficult affairs that the Gardes struggle with), members(Chevreusse,Letellier,Turenna); ]

230.content: [ Maison Gestion: a governmental organization, responsible for(document management,handling administrative tasks in the Court of Fontaine), members(Arouet,Chatelet,Cornelia,Difor,Eunomia,Fleicher,Gattineo,Gravier,Iaune,Jacquetta,Roialte,Semaine,Thales); ]

231.content: [ Maison Cardinalice: a governmental organization, responsible for(overseeing financial approvals); ]

232.content: [ Maison Ordalie: a governmental organization, responsible for(management of Fontaine's judicial system), chief justice(Neuvillette); ]

233.content: [ Marechaussee Phantom: a special detective force, led by(Neuvillette), comprised of(Melusines); ]

234.content: [ Garde: officers, responsible for(maintaining the security in Fontaine), part of the(Maison Gardiennage); ]

235.content: [ Gardemeks: robots, operated by the(Maison Gardiennage), responsible for(daily security matters,aiding Gardes), can be privately own by the wealthy of Fontaine, Gardemeks owned by the Maison Gardiennage are pre-programmed and cannot be operated by a human, responds quick to help others; ]

236.content: [ Melusines: a species, all-female species, short stature, appearance(long tuffed tails, long ears, mitten-like hands), come in different(colors,hairstyle); ]

237.content: [ Oratrice Mecanique d'Analyse Cardinale: a large weighing scale, created by Focalors, used to converts people's belief in justice into Indemnitium, former power generator for(the Court of Fontaine,Erinnyes Forest), used to deliver judgment to court cases, no longer operational after Focalors' death; ]

238.content: [ House of the Hearth: a orphanage organization, run by(Arlecchino), orphans often raised to(join the Fatui,remain close to the Fatui), orphans with potential are dispatched as agents to other nations in Teyvat, fate of orphans without potential are unknown, orphans(view each other as family,are given the surnames(Snezhevich,Snezhevna)), orphans(Lyney,Lynette,Freminet), located in the(Hotel Bouffes d'ete);  ]

239.content: [ Romaritime Flower: a flower, color(purple-blue), a local flower to Fontaine, found underwater in(Salacia Plain,Elton Trench,Chemin de L'Espoir), can be bought from(Hinterman,Xana); ]

240.content: [ Fontaine Specialties: Romaritime Flower, Rainbow Rose, Lumitoile, Lumidouce Bell, Lakelight Lily, Beryl Conch, Spring of the First Dewdrop, Subdetection Unit; ]

241.content: [ Lumidouce Bell: a flower, color(purple-blue, center green), a local flower to Fontaine, found north of the(Court of Fontaine,Beryl Region); ]

242.content: [ Lakelight Lily: a lily, color(blue), a local lily to Fontaine, found in the Foggy Forest Path, can be bought from(Pahsiv); ]

243.content: [ Beryl Conch: a conch, color(grey-blue), found underwater in(Salacia Plain,Elton Trench,Chemin de L'Espoir), can be bought from(Hinterman,Xana); ]

244.content: [ Lumitoile: a starfish, color(blue-purple), found(on beaches, underwater) in the(Liffey Region); ]

245.content: [ Rainbow Rose: a rose, color(pink), found in(the Beryl Region,the Court of Fontaine Region,around the Fountain of Lucine), can be bought from(Eugenie); ]

246.content: [ Spring of the First Dewdrop: a dewdrop, color(blue), can be found underwater surrounding the(Tower of Ipsissimus), can be bought from(Pahsiv); ]

247.content: [ Subdetection Unit: a gadget, used to monitor environment data, can be found in the(Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region); ]

248.content: [ Lyney: adoptive older brother of(Freminet,Lynette), gender(male), occupation(Magician), hosts magic shows, secretly part of the(Fatui), raised in the(House of the Hearth); ]

249.content: [ Lynette: adoptive younger sister of(Freminet,Lynette), gender(female), occupation(Assistant), assists Lyney in his magic shows, secretly part of the(Fatui), raised in the(House of the Hearth); ]

250.content: [ Arlecchino: referred to as "Father" by(Freminet,Lyney,Lynette), gender(female), the fourth of the eleven Fatui Harbringers, director of the(House of the Hearth), treats those in the House of the Hearth as her "children"; ]

251.content: [ Freminet: gender(male), occupation(diver), adoptive younger brother of(Lyney,Lynette), secretly part of the(Fatui), raised in the(House of the Hearth); ]
